attributes.action: Doubling the funding for Lifeboats: the Government should match, pound for pound, the money the RNLI raises for itself.
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, ask the Government to commit to using central funds to match, pound for pound, all the money that the Royal National Lifeboat Institution raises for itself, thus doubling the money available to support the work of RNLI, and recognising and saluting the selfless courage of these life-saving volunteers.
